comments.body:
At some point we have to unify CLI parameters for this. At the moment, daml on sql, the JSON API, the trigger service and now the non-repudiation middleware all specify the database url slightly differently.

We should also open an issue to make this configurable via an environment variable (not because I think it’s really all that useful for security purposes but it’s often a policy for our customers to not specify any secrets via CLI).
I agree, initially I had my own names, then I realized I was completely off compared to the rest of the runtime components.
